price: (Musa yongeraho ati) “Mu by’ukuri aba bantu bazorekwa kubera ibyo barimo (kugaragira ibigirwamana), kandi ibyo bakora byose ni imfabusa.”
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مُتَبَّرٞ مَّا هُمۡ فِيهِ وَبَٰطِلٞ مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi mutabbarun mā hum fīhi wabāṭilun mā kānū yaʿmalūna
